name: Fish Game (Mistress Of Universes)
description:
Have you played Fish Game yet? It's the great new game that everybody's talking about!

I made this in 3 days using the basic assets provided in the DragonRuby Game Toolkit and at the behest of my friends, I am not changing said assets, at least for this game. It's a very basic game and is missing multiple things that I am still learning to include but my friends loved it to an obsessive degree and I wanted to make it available to them so that I wasn't the only one incapable of working on schoolwork because of this game.

Playable with WASD or the arrow keys.

Current Top Score:
